PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_OutsideDesignCriteria
PropertySetDef.Definition: Outside air conditions used as the basis for calculating thermal loads at peak conditions, as well as the weather data location from which these conditions were obtained. HISTORY: New property set in IFC Release 1.0.

PropertyDef.Name: HeatingDryBulb
PropertyDef.Definition: Outside dry bulb temperature for heating design.

NameAliases.NameAlias: 暖房用設計外気乾球温度

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 暖房用設計用外気乾球温度。

PropertyDef.Name: HeatingWetBulb
PropertyDef.Definition: Outside wet bulb temperature for heating design.

NameAliases.NameAlias: 暖房用設計外気湿球温度

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 暖房用設計用外気湿球温度。

PropertyDef.Name: HeatingDesignDay
PropertyDef.Definition: The month, day and time that has been selected for the heating design calculations.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 暖房設計用気象データの日付。

PropertyDef.Name: CoolingDryBulb
PropertyDef.Definition: Outside dry bulb temperature for cooling design.

NameAliases.NameAlias: 冷房用設計外気乾球温度

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 冷房用設計用外気乾球温度。

PropertyDef.Name: CoolingWetBulb
PropertyDef.Definition: Outside wet bulb temperature for cooling design.

NameAliases.NameAlias: 冷房用設計外気湿球温度

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 冷房用設計用外気湿球温度。

PropertyDef.Name: CoolingDesignDay
PropertyDef.Definition: The month, day and time that has been selected for the cooling design calculations.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 冷房設計用気象データの日時（月、日、時刻）。

PropertyDef.Name: WeatherDataStation
PropertyDef.Definition: The site weather data station description or reference to the data source from which weather data was obtained for use in calculations.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 空調負荷計算時使用する気象データの気象台所在地。

PropertyDef.Name: WeatherDataDate
PropertyDef.Definition: The date for which the weather data was gathered.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 気象台所在地の気象データ。

PropertyDef.Name: BuildingThermalExposure
PropertyDef.Definition: The thermal exposure expected by the building based on surrounding site conditions.

NameAliases.NameAlias: 周囲環境からの熱放射強度

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 周囲環境から建物への熱放射強度。

PropertyDef.Name: PrevailingWindDirection
PropertyDef.Definition: The prevailing wind angle direction measured from True North (0 degrees) in a clockwise direction.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 卓越風の風向、真北は0°、時計回り。

PropertyDef.Name: PrevailingWindVelocity
PropertyDef.Definition: The design wind velocity coming from the direction specified by the PrevailingWindDirection attribute.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: PrevailingWindDirection 属性に示された風向から来た卓越風の風速。

PsetDefinitionAliases.PsetDefinitionAlias: ピーク時熱負荷を計算するために使用する所在地の外気条件。履歴：IFC1.0に定義された新属性。
